subject: Mountain Climbing
lead_paragraph: Masatoshi Kuriaki did not linger at the summit of Mount Foraker in Anchorage when he became the first solo climber to conquer the 17,400-foot mountain in winter.
snippet: Masatoshi Kuriaki did not linger at the summit of Mount Foraker in Anchorage when he became the first solo climber to conquer the 17,400-foot mountain in winter.
